accessibility.text: Compensation for rising prices to keep me from earning less in real terms

Workers mistakenly believe they “earned” 5% and inflation “robbed” them of 2%”
When in fact, they earned only 3% for increased productivity
Compensation for rising prices to keep me from earning less in real terms
and they got an additional 2% to compensate them for inflation
Workers mistakenly believe they “earned” 5% and inflation “robbed” them of 2%”
When in fact, they earned only 3% for increased productivity
Compensation for rising prices to keep me from earning less in real terms
and they got an additional 2% to compensate them for inflation
With zero inflation, the wage increase would have been only 3%
